name: Dodge Asteroids
description:
You are a lost space traveler who wants to get back home after a fabulous journey. The only problem is that there are some pesky asteroids staying in your way that you probably don't want to make contact with. What do you do? Do you dodge 'em or do you shoot 'em?

Credits

ansimuz - for graphics

Jonathan So - for music

Little Robot Sound Factory - for sound effects
